column1: |                                                                                                           | Freight crossing from Down                                                                                      | Freight passes Bickley Junction on the Up Chatham Slow | 2                                |

|                                                                                                           | Crossing moves timed at Bickley Junction do not require the standard {1⁄2} adjustment. Values should be applied |                                                        |                                  |

|                                                                                                           | Freight trains crossing to the Down Slow                                                                        | Speed Differential                                     | 1                                |

|                                                                                                           | Down Chatham Fast to Down Slow Tonbridge                                                                        | Approach Control VS203                                 | {1⁄2}                            |

|                                                                                                           | Crossing Down Chatham Fast to Down Slow                                                                         | Approach Control signal VS199                          | {1} and also {1} approaching     |

|                                                                                                           | Crossing Down Chatham Slow to Down Fast                                                                         | Approach Control signal VS201                          | {1⁄2} and also {1⁄2} approaching |

|                                                                                                           | Crossing Down Chatham Slow to Down Slow                                                                         | Approach Control signal VS201                          | {1⁄2}                            |

|                                                                                                           | Crossing Up Fast Tonbridge Loop to Up                                                                           | Speed differential                                     | {1⁄2} approaching next timing    |

|                                                                                                           | All trains passing from Up Slow Tonbridge                                                                       | Speed differential                                     | {1⁄2} approaching next timing    |

|                                                                                                           | Loop to Up Chatham Slow or Fast                                                                                 |                                                        | point *                          |

|                                                                                                           | Crossing Up Chatham Slow to Up Chatham                                                                          | Approach Control signal VS200                          | {1}                              |

|                                                                                                           | * applicable if the train is stopping at Bickley or Bromley South. 1 minute if not                              |                                                        |                                  |

|                                                                                                           | Freight crossing from Down Chatham Fast or to                                                                   | Freight passes on Up Chatham                           | 3 1⁄2                            |

|                                                                                                           | Down Slow Tonbridge Loop or Freight crossing                                                                    | Fast                                                   |                                  |

|                                                                                                           | from Down Chatham Slow to Down Chatham                                                                          |                                                        |                                  |

|                                                                                                           | Fast or Down Slow Tonbridge Loop                                                                                |                                                        |                                  |

| A train exceeding 690m/107SLU in length on the Up Slow Tonbridge Loop will foul VS232 signal in rear when |                                                                                                                 |                                                        |                                  |

| Therefore, junction margins must be based on train’s departure time at Bickley Junction                   |                                                                                                                 |                                                        |                                  |

| A train exceeding 679m/106SLU in length on the Up Fast Tonbridge Loop will foul VS214 signal in rear when |                                                                                                                 |                                                        |                                  |

| Therefore, junction margins must be based on train’s departure time at Bickley Junction                   |                                                                                                                 |                                                        |                                  |
